section.title: Work Report
section.simpara: For this project I did image representation of BeagleBoneBlack hardware. For this I have used svg technology. Next part of my work was creating a component witch is able to read configuration xml file and visualize BeagleBone board with respect to given configuration. To solve this problem i have used xslt technology as other members of the team.
Most beneficial thing on this project was that I have learned little bit about github and possibilities that markup languages offer.
